title: Did a teacher from Berkeley University say that rural Americans are "bad people "?
subtitle: Jackson Kernon, a Ph.D. student in philosophy, became the hub of Internet rage after he published a series of tweetings in November 2019.
author: Dan MacGuill
vclaim: Jackson Kernon, a professor of philosophy at the University of California Berkeley, wrote on Twitter that rural Americans are "bad people who have made bad decisions in life."
